dc_title_s: North America: with its water courses and inland navigation.; Grand canal celebration
dc_description_s: Shows rivers, country borders, major cities. Alaska shown as Russian Territory. At lower left: "lithography of Imbert & Co." Possibly from Cadwallader Colden's "Memoir, prepared at the request of a committee of the Common council of the city of New York and presented to the mayor of the city, at the celebration of the completion of the New York canals", published in 1825. Tropic of Cancer is marked in lower left corner. 1 map; 19 x 24 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Dahl, James, former owner.,Imbert's Lithographic Office, lithographer.
